entities.name: seer
entities.description: The seer is overhearing a conversation between Harry and Dumbledore. The seer's presence is not explicitly stated but can be inferred from the context.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is having a conversation with Dumbledore about finding a Horcrux. He is eager to go on the mission and is boiling with anger at Snape.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is having a conversation with Harry about finding a Horcrux. He is warning Harry of the dangers involved in the mission.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as someone who has increased Harry's desire to do something desperate and risky.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is warning Harry of the dangers involved in finding a Horcrux.
Harry's anger towards Snape has increased his desire to do something desperate and risky.
